title: Minecraft 1.2 预览版发布
author: strawmaine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 strawmaine 于 2012-3-1 13:11 编辑 

Minecraft 1.2 Preview     预览版抢先体验下载(更新细节请参考11楼)：
客户端： http://assets.minecraft.net/1_2/minecraft.jar服务端： http://assets.minecraft.net/1_2/minecraft_server.jar
正式版明日（3月1日）正式发布，大家敬请期待啊


消息原文Minecraft 1.2 Previewby Jens Bergensten on February 29, 2012
Hello!We plan to release Minecraft 1.2 tomorrow, but you can already check it out by downloading and installing it like a weekly snapshot!Client: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_2/minecraft.jarServer: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_2/minecraft_server.jar
Full change log will be posted tomorrow, but it’s basically all the snapshots since Minecraft 1.1 packed into one :)

replies.author: 天空之城TCD
replies.txt_content:
贴吧某新特征翻译：
1.Added a new type of Stone Brick, called Circle Stone Brick, which is only accessible in Creative Mode.
添加了一种新的石砖方块：圆石砖，但只能在创造模式获得。图片：




Grid_Circle_Stone_Brick.png (1.17 KB, 下载次数: 9)

下载附件

2012-3-1 10:26 上传






2.Pressing F3 now displays what biome you are currently in. Also, raw, sky & block brightness values called rl, sl & bl respectively.
现在按下F3后可以显示你所在的生物群系，而rl，sl，bl分别是你身体的明暗度，天空明暗度和方块明暗度
3.Slabs can now be placed upside-down.
半砖现在可以放在方块下部。（就是能贴着方块底面）
4.Added mechanical sounds for Iron Golems
给铁傀儡添加了机械音效。
5.When crafting Slabs, you now get 6 instead of 3
When crafting Ladders, you now get 3 instead of 2
现在合成半砖时一次可以得到6个（就是三个原石可以合成六个原石半砖而不是以前的三个）合成台阶一次可以得到3个而不是以前的的两个（好消息啊）
6.Removed camera controls accidentally added in 12w08a
移除了12w08a中意外添加的视角控制。（意外添加……）
7.Two new blocks have been added to the terrain.png file. They look similar toSandstone but instead they contain hieroglyphics. These blocks have not been added to game yet. 
有两个新的贴图加入了terrain.png中，看上去像是砂砖但上面却有着一些难以辨认的符号。但这两个方块还没有被添加进来。就是这两个：




32px-NewSandstoneGrid1.png (948 Bytes, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2012-3-1 10:27 上传




（我似乎看到了jj的脸……）和




32px-NewSandstoneGrid2.png (948 Bytes, 下载次数: 9)

下载附件

2012-3-1 10:27 上传
